problem.markdown:
1. Which of the following is a forced vibration system?
() Car moving on a rough road () Wind blowing at tree top () Ocean waves at offshore rig (x) All of these
2. Base of a mechanical system is being given a harmonic input motion starting from its mean position. Amplitude and frequency of the input motion is 5mm and π/2 rad/s respectively. What will be the position of the base (with respect to mean position) after 3seconds ?
(x) -5mm () 0mm () 5mm () None of these
3. Solution of forced vibration system consists of
() Only Steady State part () Only Transient Part (x) Both Steady State and Transient part () None of these
problem.p: 1. Which of the following is a forced vibration system?

choicegroup.choice: Car moving on a rough road

problem.p: 2. Base of a mechanical system is being given a harmonic input motion starting from its mean position. Amplitude and frequency of the input motion is 5mm and π/2 rad/s respectively. What will be the position of the base (with respect to mean position) after 3seconds ?
3. Solution of forced vibration system consists of

choicegroup.choice: Both Steady State and Transient part
